thread.title: Liverpool ‘ghost goal’ expert Luis Garcia says Emre Can’s fumbled shot should have counted after it appeared to bounce past Fraser Forster and over the line

author: wdownes
title: Liverpool ‘ghost goal’ expert Luis Garcia says Emre Can’s fumbled shot should have counted after it appeared to bounce past Fraser Forster and over the line
text:
EFL HE SHOULD KNOW Liverpool ‘ghost goal’ expert Luis Garcia says Emre Can’s fumbled shot should have counted after it appeared to bounce past Fraser Forster and over the line 
Daniel Sturridge was waiting to profit from Forster's error before the England keeper clawed the ball of the line by WALLY DOWNES JR
